name: Cat & Gold
description:
Synopsis
In order to protect the peace of the cats, you (the cat) have been ordered to retrieve the gold nuggets from the evil dog.
Throw koban to punish the bad dog, retrieve the gold nuggets placed in the buildings, and escape in a balloon!
Sneak into various buildings and use gimmicks and equipment to accomplish your mission!
You (the cat) are the only one who can restore peace to the cats!

Overview
The game is a side-scrolling 3D action game. You can move forward, backward, left and right, jump, and throw gold (koban).
The purpose of this work is for players to collect gold nuggets and clear all stages within the time limit.

Game features
・Collect gold nuggets and escape. Please enjoy the gestures of cute cats.
・There are 10 stages. There is a high difficulty mode.
・ You can buy items at the shop with cat food that can be picked up in the game. It can be strengthened with a cat, so you can easily capture it.
・There is an additional mode to change the player character.
